txt.en: 'There are some truly wondrous gourds growing in the old wheat field. Gather some so that we may decorate!'

Ermentrude Haybank, the Maze-master of Wistmead, asks of you to gather some of the amazing decorative gourds that grow within the wheat-walls.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>
Bring the gourds to Ermentrude Haybank
The Wistmead wheat maze can be found in the Wistmead Harvest Festival space.\n\nYou should bring the gourds to Ermentrude Haybank at the wheat maze entrance.
'How wonderful! Look at all these decorative gourds!'
The Wistmead wheat maze can be found in the Wistmead Harvest Festival space.\n\nErmentrude Haybank has tasked you with gathering decorative gourds.
